title: New: Golden Sundays – All Because Of Me
content:
Hailing from Budapest, folk-pop outfit Golden Sundays have an element to their debut track that, as my younger brother put it, ‘Gary Barlow would be proud of’.

All Because Of Me is a fantastic indie-pop number, not breaking any boundaries, but thoroughly enjoyable. From the lightly strummed guitar, to the honey-sweet lyrics (‘I no longer I feel I have to live like someone else, in your arms tonight everything seems right’), all centered around the insanely catchy chorus, it’s a debut track well worthy of praise. Check out All Because Of Me below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
